channel.title: Comments on: Maple Mousse in Bacon Cup – Daring Bakers Challenge April 2011

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description: Can't wait to see what is next! I am sure the chocolate themed edible cup will taste better, I myself avoided the bacon cups altogether and replaced it with almond cups which happened to taste wonderful...
item.content:encoded: Can’t wait to see what is next! I am sure the chocolate themed edible cup will taste better, I myself avoided the bacon cups altogether and replaced it with almond cups which happened to taste wonderful…

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Good on you for still trying it Anita! I ran out of time and I wanted to save my precious maple stash. Not that I don't love bacon and maple together, I do! :)
item.content:encoded: Good on you for still trying it Anita! I ran out of time and I wanted to save my precious maple stash. Not that I don’t love bacon and maple together, I do! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Great job on this month's challenge! Your bacon cups look perfect (mine were all over the place) and your mousse looks smooth and silky! Great job! Its a shame that you didn't particularly like them, especially after all the work that went into making this! Maybe it was the nut cup that helped to tie it all together?
item.content:encoded: Great job on this month’s challenge! Your bacon cups look perfect (mine were all over the place) and your mousse looks smooth and silky! Great job! Its a shame that you didn’t particularly like them, especially after all the work that went into making this! Maybe it was the nut cup that helped to tie it all together?

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: I must admit I am a sucker for bacon and maple so I got excited about this one. Your looks fab! Its a shame its not for you - oh well, good experience I guess :)
item.content:encoded: I must admit I am a sucker for bacon and maple so I got excited about this one. Your looks fab! Its a shame its not for you – oh well, good experience I guess ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Sorry you weren't crazy about this. It ought to be good...maple syrup and bacon go so well together! Anyway, I love the bacon cups. Can think of lots of lovely ways to use them!
item.content:encoded:
Sorry you weren’t crazy about this. It ought to be good…maple syrup and bacon go so well together!
Anyway, I love the bacon cups. Can think of lots of lovely ways to use them!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Smart idea halving the mousse, and it's a shame to hear it wasn't worth making again. Hope you had a good Easter break.
item.content:encoded: Smart idea halving the mousse, and it’s a shame to hear it wasn’t worth making again. Hope you had a good Easter break.

item.title: By: nachiketa
item.dc:creator: nachiketa
item.content:encoded:
Lovely presentation of edible containers…

Cheers,
The Variable, Crazy Over Desserts – Nachiketa
Catch me on facebook @ Crazy Over Desserts

item.title: By: Rosa
item.dc:creator: Rosa
item.description:
Well done! They must be delicious. A perfect flavor combo.
Cheers,
Rosa
item.content:encoded:
Well done! They must be delicious. A perfect flavor combo.

Cheers,

Rosa

item.title: By: muppy
item.dc:creator: muppy
item.description: It does look really good but i imagine i would agree with you on the taste! I think the cream would not really belong, if you were to stick to bacon baskets maybe some other ingredient to make it mousse like?
item.content:encoded: It does look really good but i imagine i would agree with you on the taste! I think the cream would not really belong, if you were to stick to bacon baskets maybe some other ingredient to make it mousse like?
